ast.name: Taxi!
ast.comment:
Before the days of GPS the was The Knowledge. Taxi drivers knew the routes, which fares to take and when to turn them down. Can you succeed at this ancient noble art?

Switch between touch and tilt to control the taxi. Keep your fuel tank topped and remember to turn down fares that are unfair. Have fun!

Added end-of-game animations using Board, rather than using Wall➡text box, because of problems I had with the exported xap.

body.text: Test if Gameloop is dead by verifying it is called between moves

thenBody.text: Factor controls how hard the game is, by controlling the maximum fare.

body.text: Push a page so that the phone back button can be used to pause the game
Start in the middle
Create a stack for (x,y) pairs
Put the first point in the collection, when we get back here we are finished.
The local 5-spot made of the current cell's neighbours
While there are unvisited cells...
Count the neighbours using pixel colour scheme
If the cell has unvisited neighbours

thenBody.text: Store current cell for later.
Pick one of the neighbours
Only doing a local neighbourhood calculation (lazy instantiation). This is okay because it is fast and generating the entire maze upfront would take hours.
We are only generating on the local 5-spot.

elseBody.text: Get the next location back up the tree

thenBody.text: Remove the location from the list

body.text: In this 5x5 add a fares and a filling station

thenBody.text: Reduced the number of filling stations

body.text: Create a picture to hold the fares and another for filling stations
Used to set the board colour...
Replace my map with 12 tiles
Flags rather than sprites
We use the simple code
R=north
G=east
B=south
A=west
Unvisited neighbours
Remove wall, colours the leaving cell and the joining cell. If we are at an edge return (-1,-1), otherwise return the new cell.
Dummy value for the case of edges
TD BUG? - from argb() in the webapp is 0-255 NOT 0-1
If we have hit an edge we check for that here.
Always return a valid place
Make sure to fill the new maze, so that we know all cells are currently 'unvisited'
In here because phone back button was pressed

elseBody.text: Gameloop can die on pressing the phone back button (known bug in TD), so here we assume it is dead and the Gameloop will tell us if it is still active
If the gameloop is dead, tilt won't work.
Set GameloopDead, if the Gameloop is still alive it will set this false
Set GameloopDead, if the Gameloop is still alive it will set this false

body.text: Trial animation

elseBody.text: Set GameloopDead, if the Gameloop is still alive it will set this false
Set GameloopDead, if the Gameloop is still alive it will set this false

body.text: Serves up the appropriate road junction, based on a binary representation NESW

thenBody.text: One slow section

body.text: If this is in the row beyond the top of the screen, move it to the bottom.
Find the bottom left corner
If this is in the row beyond the bottom of the screen, move it to the top.
If this is in the row beyond the left of the screen, move it to the right.
If this is in the row beyond the right of the screen, move it to the left.
Find out which type of junction we have

thenBody.text: Never visited so we don't put in on the map

body.text: Need to just move the tiles the remaining distance, not the full distance
Choose a nearby location
Should be sparse, but sparseness is not guaranteed so identify dense areas.

thenBody.text: This colour is used to determine the value of the fare
Area is apparently dense so no new fares are needed

body.text: Decorates the basic picture with any passengers or filling stations
Should be sparse, but sparseness is not guaranteed so identify dense areas.

thenBody.text: Area is apparently dense so no new fares are needed

body.text: If there is a filling station, fill up

thenBody.text: Rule: if you have money you refuel

body.text: Is there someone in the taxi?

thenBody.text: Have we reached the destination?
The game gets harder a little faster than it gets easier.
Multiplier on fares to new locations
Up to a tank of gas for a single journey, double for new locations. Based on green.
TD BUG? Colour numbers on web app are inconsistent
Accepted the fare

elseBody.text: Increment fares since low fares is the main reason for turning the customer down. Turn down four fares to have the same effect as a late drop.

body.text: Spend money to make a junction
Set picture invalid so that next time we get a new town.
Set picture invalid so that next time we get a new town.

thenBody.text: At a cross roads so there are lights
One in three times you hit a red light. Three fuel point penalty

body.text: Spend money to make a junction
If this is a crossroads don't do anything (protect against accidental multi-tap)
Test for game over
Current picture under the taxi needs to be drawn as it has been visited. This only makes a difference early in the game.

thenBody.text: East-west
